author: Anonymous Helix
title: defining functions
question:
Hi,
When I tried to practice the defining functions, I followed along with the video, but DrRacket says that "c: this variable is not defined", and I wonder why is that. 
Here is my line:
(require 2htdp/image)
(define bulb c)
  (circle 40 "solid" c )
(buld (string-append "re" "d"))
(buld "red")
(circle 40 "solid" "red") 
Thank you
student_answer: I think you need to add brackets for parameters, which means it should be (define (bulb c) ...). Also some typos in your following lines, it's bulb instead of buld :)
